name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.interaction.worker.await.promptSheet
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_style:
          label: Style:
          required@bool: yes
          data@json:
            [
              {
                "key": "custom",
                "name": "Custom",
                "description": "Provide your own data."
              },
              {
                "key": "record_chooser",
                "name": "Record Chooser",
                "description": "Select records of a given type."
              }
            ]
          limit: 10
          #default: option1
          schema:
            layout:
              #style: grid
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              #filtering@bool: yes
              #title_column: key
            columns:
              selection/key:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/name:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
              text/description:
  
  decision/style:
    outcome/custom:
      if@bool: {{prompt_style == 'custom' ? 'yes'}}
      then:
        return:
          snippet@text:
            sheet/prompt_{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
              label: Label:
              required@bool: yes
              data@json:
                [
                  {
                    "key": "option1",
                    "name": "Option 1",
                    "description": "This is a description of option one."
                  },
                  {
                    "key": "option2",
                    "name": "Option 2",
                    "description": "This is a description of option two."
                  }
                ]
              limit: 5
              default: option1
              schema:
                layout:
                  headings@bool: no
                  paging@bool: no
                  #filtering@bool: yes
                  #title_column: key
                columns:
                  selection/key:
                    params:
                      mode: single
                      #mode: multiple
                  text/name:
                    params:
                      bold@bool: yes
                  text/description:
    
    outcome/record_chooser:
      if@bool: {{prompt_style == 'record_chooser' ? 'yes'}}
      then:
        return:
          snippet@text:
            sheet/prompt_{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
              label: Label:
              required@bool: yes
              data:
                automation:
                  uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.records
                  inputs:
                    record_type: task
                    query_required@text:
                      status:o
              limit: 5
              #default: option1
              schema:
                layout:
                  headings@bool: no
                  paging@bool: no
                  filtering@bool: yes
                  #title_column: key
                columns:
                  selection/id:
                    params:
                      mode: single
                      #mode: multiple
                  card/_label:
                    params:
                      bold@bool: yes
                      #image@bool: yes
